title: Create TikTok-style video sharing platform with owner-only uploads

requirements.text: Implement owner authentication using Internet Identity to restrict video uploads to a single authorized user

quotes: only I can upload my videos

acceptanceCriteria: Owner can authenticate using Internet Identity
Only authenticated owner principal can access upload functionality
Unauthenticated users can view videos but cannot upload

requirements.text: Create video upload functionality that accepts video files, stores them in stable memory, and associates them with metadata (title, description, upload timestamp)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts video file uploads from authenticated owner
Videos are stored persistently in stable memory
Each video includes title, description, and timestamp metadata
Upload endpoint validates owner identity before accepting videos

requirements.text: Build a TikTok-style profile page displaying the creator's profile information including profile picture, username, bio, and video count statistics
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page displays creator profile picture
Profile shows username and bio text
Layout follows TikTok-style vertical profile design

requirements.text: Create a video feed interface where fans can browse and watch uploaded videos in a scrollable grid or vertical feed layout
acceptanceCriteria: Videos display in a browsable feed/grid layout
Clicking a video opens a player view
Feed is accessible to all users without authentication

requirements.text: Design and implement a cohesive visual theme with bold, vibrant colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and smooth animations that create an engaging social media aesthetic throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all pages
Typography hierarchy supports readability and brand identity
Smooth transitions and animations enhance user experience
Visual style feels modern and social-media-oriented

constraints: Video uploads must be restricted to the authenticated owner only
All users can view videos without authentication
Use Internet Identity for owner authentication

required: Creator profile picture placeholder with modern gradient design (profile-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
App logo with bold, energetic styling suitable for video platform branding (app-logo.dim_300x100.png)
Video thumbnail placeholder for empty states (video-placeholder.dim_400x600.png)
